segments.text: Are you sure it was him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to date him . Of course it was him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're a nurse at New York General Hospital ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , on the cancer ward . And Taylor was there . He walked right by me and didn't even see me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe he was just visiting someone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you saw how skinny and pale he looks . He has " cancer patient " written all over his face .
segments.speaker: S2
